sqlQuery.name: all_taxa_count
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count(*) FROM apidb.Organism

sqlQuery.name: all_sequences_count
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count(aas.aa_sequence_id) FROM dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.Organism og WHERE og.taxon_id = aas.taxon_id

sqlQuery.name: all_groups_count
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count(*) FROM ApiDB.OrthologGroup

sqlQuery.name: all_taxa_info
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT taxon_id AS taxon_id, orthomcl_abbrev AS abbrev, name_for_filenames as name, 1 as is_species, name_for_filenames as common_name FROM apidb.Organism ORDER BY taxon_id ASC

sqlQuery.name: sequence_info_per_history_seq
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aas.source_id, og.name, org.name_for_filenames as name FROM dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, apidb.Organism org WHERE org.taxon_id = aas.taxon_id AND aas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id(+) AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = og.ortholog_group_id(+) AND aas.aa_sequence_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: group_per_seq
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequences_per_grp
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.aa_sequence_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: groups_like_seq_descrip_keyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.AaSequenceImp asi WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = asi.aa_sequence_id AND asi.subclass_view = 'ExternalAASequence' AND ogs.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND CATSEARCH(asi.description, '$querycode', '')>0 GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_pfam_accession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND db.primary_identifier = '$querycode' GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: groups_like_pfam_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND CATSEARCH(db.secondary_identifier, '$querycode', '') > 0 GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: groups_like_pfam_description
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM ( select db_ref_id from sres.DbRef where CATSEARCH(secondary_identifier, 'CANNOT_HAVE_TWO_QUERYCODES', '') > 0 union select db_ref_id from sres.DbRef where CATSEARCH(remark, '$querycode', '') > 0 ) db, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id != 0 GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_num_seqs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND og.number_of_members $number

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_num_species
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.AaSequence aas WHERE ogs.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id HAVING count(DISTINCT(aas.taxon_id)) $number

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_num_match_pairs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.ortholog_group_id, og.number_of_match_pairs AS matchpair FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE 100 * og.number_of_match_pairs * 2 / (og.number_of_members * (og.number_of_members - 1)) $number

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_percent_identity
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE avg_percent_identity $number

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_percent_match
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE avg_percent_match $number

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_blast_evalue
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE avg_evalue_mant * power(10, avg_evalue_exp) $number

sqlQuery.name: group_attributes_per_group
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ortholog_group_id, name, 0 AS avg_dcs, round(avg_percent_identity, 2) AS avg_percent_identity, round(avg_percent_match, 2) AS avg_percent_match, (avg_evalue_mant * power(10, avg_evalue_exp)) AS evalue, number_of_match_pairs, number_of_members, decode(length(biolayout_image), null, 0, 0, 0, 1) AS has_bl, decode(length(multiple_sequence_alignment), null, 0, 0, 0, 1) AS has_msa FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: taxa_num_genes_per_group
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT * FROM apidb.GroupTaxonMatrix WHERE ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: keywords_per_group
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogk.keyword, ogk.frequency FROM apidb.OrthomclGroupKeyword ogk WHERE ogk.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_domains_per_group
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogd.description, ogd.frequency FROM apidb.OrthomclGroupDomain ogd WHERE ogd.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_attributes_per_group
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aas.source_id, aas.name, aas.description, aas.length, org.name_for_filenames as name, orr.linkout_url, org.orthomcl_abbrev, ( SELECT string_agg(DISTINCT ref.primary_identifier, ', ') FROM Sres.DbRef ref JOIN Sres.ExternalDatabase db ON db.external_database_id = ref.external_database_id JOIN Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr ON dbr.external_database_release_id = ref.external_database_release_id JOIN Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref ON seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id WHERE db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups' AND seqref.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id ) AS previous_groups FROM dots.AaSequence aas JOIN apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs ON ogs.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id JOIN apidb.OrthomclResource orr ON orr.orthomcl_taxon_id = org.taxon_id JOIN apidb.Organism org ON aas.taxon_id = org.taxon_id WHERE ogs.ortholog_group_id = $1

sqlQuery.name: sequence_per_source_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.AaSequence WHERE lower(source_id) = lower(?) UNION SELECT seqref.aa_sequence_id FROM Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Seqs' AND lower(ref.primary_identifier) = lower(?)

sqlQuery.name: sequence_per_group_ac
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.aa_sequence_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.name = upper(?) UNION SELECT seqref.aa_sequence_id FROM Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups' AND lower(ref.primary_identifier) = lower(?)

sqlQuery.name: sequence_per_source_id_and_taxon
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.Organism org WHERE lower(aas.source_id) = lower(?) AND org.orthomcl_abbrev = lower(?) AND org.taxon_id = aas.taxon_id UNION SELECT seqref.aa_sequence_id FROM Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Seqs' AND lower(ref.secondary_identifier) = lower(?)

sqlQuery.name: sequence_per_secondary_identifier
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.AaSequence WHERE source_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_like_id_and_descrip_keyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT asi.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.AaSequenceImp asi WHERE asi.subclass_view = 'ExternalAASequence' AND (asi.source_id = '$querycode' OR CATSEARCH(asi.description, '$querycode', '') > 0 )

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_like_descrip_keyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT asi.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.AaSequenceImp asi WHERE asi.subclass_view = 'ExternalAASequence' AND CATSEARCH(asi.description, '$querycode', '') > 0

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_by_three_letter_abbrev
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aas.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.Organism org WHERE aas.taxon_id = org.taxon_id AND org.orthomcl_abbrev = '$querycode'

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_by_pfam_accession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT df.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND db.primary_identifier = '$querycode'

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_like_pfam_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT df.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND CATSEARCH(db.secondary_identifier, '$querycode', '') > 0

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_like_pfam_keyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT df.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND CATSEARCH(db.remark, '$querycode', '') > 0

sqlQuery.name: group_name_by_sequence_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ogs.ortholog_group_id AND ogs.aa_sequence_id=$seq_id

sqlQuery.name: sequence_info_per_sequence_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aas.source_id, aas.source_id, aas.description, aas.length, org.name_for_filenames as name, orr.linkout_url, og.name, og.ortholog_group_id, org.orthomcl_abbrev, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(DISTINCT ref.primary_identifier) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') FROM Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref WHERE db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups' and dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id and ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id and seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id and seqref.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id) AS previous_groups FROM dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.OrthomclResource orr, apidb.Organism org, apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE org.taxon_id = orr.orthomcl_taxon_id AND aas.taxon_id = org.taxon_id AND aas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id(+) AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = og.ortholog_group_id(+) AND aas.aa_sequence_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: group_name_per_group_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: group_id_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE name = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_info_per_group_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aas.aa_sequence_id, aas.source_id, aas.description, aas.length, org.orthomcl_abbrev FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.Organism org WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id AND aas.taxon_id = org.taxon_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: max_length_per_group_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT MAX(aas.length) FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.Organism og WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id AND aas.taxon_id = org.taxon_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: domains_info_per_sequence_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aas.source_id, db.primary_identifier, db.secondary_identifier, db.remark, al.start_min, al.end_max FROM dots.AaSequence aas, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, dots.AaLocation al, sres.DbRef db WHERE aas.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = al.aa_feature_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND aas.aa_sequence_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: group_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.name = ? UNION SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups' AND ref.primary_identifier = ?

sqlQuery.name: group_per_seq_source_id_and_taxon
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, apidb.Organism org WHERE lower(aas.source_id) = lower(?) AND org.orthomcl_abbrev = lower(?) AND aas.taxon_id = org.taxon_id AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id UNION SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Seqs' AND lower(ref.secondary_identifier) = lower(?)

sqlQuery.name: group_per_seq_source_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE lower(aas.source_id) = lower(?) AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id UNION SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Seqs' AND lower(ref.primary_identifier) = lower(?)

sqlQuery.name: sequence_info_per_source_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aas.source_id, orr.linkout_url, org.name_for_filenames as name, og.name, aas.description, aas.length, aas.source_id, aas.sequence, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(CAST(COLLECT(DISTINCT ref.primary_identifier) AS apidb.varchartab), ', ') FROM Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref WHERE db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups' and dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id and ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id and seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id and seqref.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id) AS previous_groups FROM dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.Organism org, apidb.OrthomclResource orr, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE aas.taxon_id = org.taxon_id AND og.ortholog_group_id(+) = ogs.ortholog_group_id AND org.taxon_id = orr.orthomcl_taxon_id AND aas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id(+) AND og.orthomcl_abbrev = lower(?) AND lower(aas.source_id) = lower(?)

sqlQuery.name: domain_arch_per_sequence_source_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT al.start_min, al.end_max, db.primary_identifier, db.secondary_identifier, db.remark FROM dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.Organism og, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.AaLocation al, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = al.aa_feature_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND aas.taxon_id = og.taxon_id AND og.orthomcl_abbrev = lower(?) AND lower(aas.source_id) = lower(?) ORDER BY al.start_min ASC, al.end_max DESC

sqlQuery.name: species_details
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.taxon_id, og.name_for_filenames as name, og.orthomcl_abbrev, od.resource_name, od.resource_url, od.description FROM apidb.Organism og, apidb.OrthomclResource od WHERE od.orthomcl_taxon_id = og.taxon_id

sqlQuery.name: num_sequences_per_species
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dots.AASequence WHERE taxon_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: num_groups_per_species
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(ogs.ortholog_group_id)) as group_count, COUNT(ogs.aa_sequence_id) as sequence_count FROM dots.AASequence aas, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE aas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id AND aas.taxon_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: msa_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT multiple_sequence_alignment FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE name = ?

sqlQuery.name: svg_content_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT svg_content FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE name = ?

sqlQuery.name: biolayout_image_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT biolayout_image FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE name = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_info_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aas.source_id, aas.description, org.name_for_filenames as name, aas.length, aas.sequence, org.orthomcl_abbrev FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.Organism org WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ogs.ortholog_group_id AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id AND aas.taxon_id = org.taxon_id AND org.name_for_filenames = ?

sqlQuery.name: domain_sequence_info_per_group_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aas.aa_sequence_id, aas.source_id, aas.description, aas.length, og.orthomcl_abbrev FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.Organism og WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id AND aas.taxon_id = og.taxon_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: history_sequence_info_per_sequence_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aas.source_id, aas.description, og.name_for_filenames as name, aas.length, aas.sequence, og.orthomcl_abbrev FROM dots.AaSequence aas, apidb.Organism og WHERE aas.taxon_id = og.taxon_id AND aas.aa_sequence_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: group_name_per_sequence_source_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT g.name FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, apidb.OrthologGroup g, apidb.Organism og, dots.aasequence aas WHERE lower(aas.source_id) = lower(?) AND og.orthomcl_abbrev = lower(?) AND aas.taxon_id = og.taxon_id AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = aas.aa_sequence_id AND g.ortholog_group_id = ogs.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: orthologs_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: WITH ogs AS (SELECT os.aa_sequence_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence os WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = os.ortholog_group_id AND og.name = ?) SELECT o.sequence_id_a as query_id, o.sequence_id_b as subject_id FROM apidb.Ortholog o, ogs ogs1, ogs ogs2 WHERE o.sequence_id_a = ogs1.aa_sequence_id AND o.sequence_id_b = ogs2.aa_sequence_id

sqlQuery.name: coorthologs_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: WITH ogs AS (SELECT os.aa_sequence_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence os WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = os.ortholog_group_id AND og.name = ?) SELECT o.sequence_id_a as query_id, o.sequence_id_b as subject_id FROM apidb.Coortholog o, ogs ogs1, ogs ogs2 WHERE o.sequence_id_a = ogs1.aa_sequence_id AND o.sequence_id_b = ogs2.aa_sequence_id

sqlQuery.name: inparalogs_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: WITH ogs AS (SELECT os.aa_sequence_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence os WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = os.ortholog_group_id AND og.name = ?) SELECT o.sequence_id_a as query_id, o.sequence_id_b as subject_id FROM apidb.Inparalog o, ogs ogs1, ogs ogs2 WHERE o.sequence_id_a = ogs1.aa_sequence_id AND o.sequence_id_b = ogs2.aa_sequence_id

sqlQuery.name: edges_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: WITH ogs AS (SELECT os.aa_sequence_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence os WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = os.ortholog_group_id AND og.name = ?) SELECT o.query_id, o.subject_id, o.evalue_mant, o.evalue_exp FROM apidb.SimilarSequences o, ogs ogs1, ogs ogs2 WHERE o.query_id = ogs1.aa_sequence_id AND o.subject_id = ogs2.aa_sequence_id AND o.query_id < o.subject_id
